divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: At about 8:45 on March 19, I was driving home from eating dinner and I looked up to see four lights arranged in a circle. Two of them were blinking between about eight different colors, including different shades of blue, red, and green, as well as several other colors. The lights hovered for a second, and then started zipping around really quickly. At one point, they were spinning at a pace so fast they seemed to blend into a yellow, which then shifted to different colors, I assume from the changing of the lights. The thing then flashed away. The lights never lit up the ground, but I noticed another driver near me point up into the sky before we had to drive away. My sister wasn t able to get the camera out of the glove compartment, despite my frantic waving and shouting. Part of the reason was that she didn t seem able to see it, although she was looking right at the thing.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Raleigh
There were no other sightings in Raleigh on or around March 20th 2005
